content.question: Reprinted with the permission of Cambridge University Press.The shaded areas on the map above of South Africa indicate

choices.label: areas of the original Dutch settlements
the reserves, sometimes called Bantustans or African “homelands”
areas set aside to commemorate the location of Great Zimbabwe

content.answer: the reserves, sometimes called Bantustans or African “homelands”

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
